chapters.title: Chapter 3: The Amyrlin's Anger
chapters.info: Tiana Noselle, p. 81—Aes Sedai of the Gray Ajah. She served as Mistress of Novices among the Aes Sedai who fled the White Tower. She is short and slight, and has large brown eyes and a dimple. She looks young despite her ageless Aes Sedai features. See also Bayanar, Sheriam; Brehon, Silviana; Mistress of Novices.
